CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Eco Wave Power Global AB is a Sweden-based wave energy company engaged in the development of a smart and cost-efficient WEC, technology that converts ocean and sea waves into clean electricity. Its WEC technology employs units of point absorber floating devices, referred to as floaters, which are installed on existing marine structures such as piers, breakwaters, and jetties, or in locations in which such marine structures are required. It has its projects in Gibraltar, Israel, and other countries.
